SetupPackInfrastructureModule.bronzeDescription: Bronze pack for entry-level pulls from the common pool.
SetupPackInfrastructureModule.silverDescription: Silver pack with better chances into the rare pool.
SetupPackInfrastructureModule.goldDescription: Gold pack offering improved odds across rare and epic pools.
SetupPackInfrastructureModule.platinumDescription: Platinum pack with the best odds and access to the ultra-rare pool.
